articles.description: The self-styled Gypsy King said he was on holiday and not in the gym training earlier this month as he grew tired at the lack of progress in negotiations for his fight with British rival Joshua.
articles.content: Tyson Fury may have been trying to pull the wool over Anthony Joshua's eyes when he claimed he was drinking 12 pints a day a few weeks ago as he looks in tip-top shape already ahead of their £200mill… [+2746 chars]
